vulnerabilities.description: The remote web server does not require authentication. An attacker may be able to access sensitive information.
vulnerabilities.solution: Restrict access to the web server using authentication mechanisms.
vulnerabilities.plugin_output: The web service responded to an unauthenticated HTTP request.

vulnerabilities.plugin_name: SSL / TLS Weak Cipher Suites Supported
vulnerabilities.description: The remote service supports weak SSL cipher suites.
vulnerabilities.solution: Disable weak cipher suites and use strong cryptography.
vulnerabilities.plugin_output: The following weak cipher suites were detected...
